thread.title: Emma Stone Goes Glam in Gold Givenchy at the Oscars -- See Her Dazzling Red Carpet Look!
thread.title_full: Emma Stone Goes Glam in Gold Givenchy at the Oscars -- See Her Dazzling Red Carpet Look!

author: Desiree Murphy
title: Emma Stone Goes Glam in Gold Givenchy at the Oscars -- See Her Dazzling Red Carpet Look!

organizations.name: emma stone goes glam in gold givenchy

text: Emma Stone Goes Glam in Gold Givenchy at the Oscars -- See Her Dazzling Red Carpet Look! by Desiree Murphy 5:10   Kevin Mazur/Getty Images If Emma Stone's red carpet look is any indication of how her Oscars night will turn out, expect to see a lot of gold for La La Land ! The film racked up 14 nominations at the 89th Academy Awards , including Best Actress, which Stone is up for against Natalie Portman ( Jackie ), Meryl Streep ( Florence Foster Jenkins ), Isabelle Huppert ( Elle ) and Ruth Negga ( Loving ). Even if the red-headed beauty doesn't take home the win on Sunday, at least she can say she landed a coveted spot on almost every Best Dressed List, including our own. PHOTOS: Emma Stone, Mandy Moore, Blake Lively and More Rock 'La La Land' Inspired Looks! Seemingly taking a style cue from her La La Land character, Mia, the 28-year-old actress wore a classy, custom-designed Givenchy Haute Couture dress by Riccardo Tisci in a gold hue. The gown featured gold and bronze Swarovski crystals embroidery on the bodice, and cream to bronze dégradé crystal fringe at the bottom. Photo: Getty Images Stone's beauty look, which consisted of bouncy waves and a bold red lip, oozed old Hollywood glamour. And can we talk about those earrings? Stunning! Photo: Getty Images
